Package io.github.sirnik.daduels.utils

Enum ArenaManager

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ArenaManager>
io.github.sirnik.daduels.utils.ArenaManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ArenaManager>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum ArenaManager
extends Enum<ArenaManager>
Arena Manager. All transactions with arenas and players should go through this class.

    • getWinTarget

      public int getWinTarget()
      Gets the amount of wins needed to win a match.
      Returns:
      Amount of battle wins needed to win a match

    • updateArena

      public void updateArena​(DuelArena arena)
      Saves arena updates to database.
      Parameters:
      arena - Arena to be saved.

    • deleteArena

      public void deleteArena​(DuelArena arena)
      Removes an existing arena.
      Parameters:
      arena - Arena to be removed

    • addArena

      public boolean addArena​(DuelArena arena, boolean force)
      Attempts to add arena to list. If force is set to false, then if an arena already with said name exists, it will not be added. Side Effects:
      • Attempts to enable arena
      Parameters:
      arena - Arena to be added.
      force - Whether to force add (overwrites previous arena with similar name).
      Returns:
      true if arena was added.

    • getArenas

      public Collection<DuelArena> getArenas()
      Gets all arenas in the game.
      Returns:
      all arenas in the game.

    • getArena

      public DuelArena getArena​(String name)
      Gets arena with given name. null if nothing found.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of potential arena.
      Returns:
      Arena with said name.

    • enableArena

      public boolean enableArena​(DuelArena arena)
      Attempts to enable an arena. Returns false if it could not. Possible reasons it could not enable the arena:
      • Arena with given name not found
      • Arena is currently mid game
      • Arena has either player 1 spawn location and/or player 2 spawn location unset
      Parameters:
      arena - Arena to be enabled.
      Returns:
      true if arena was enabled.

    • isPlayerInGame

      public boolean isPlayerInGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Checks if player is in a game. Returns true if a player is in an arena (arena can be DuelState.INGAME or DuelState.OPEN.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is checked to be in game.
      Returns:
      true if player is in an arena.

    • getArenaForPlayer

      public DuelArena getArenaForPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get Arena for a given player. null if player not in an arena.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is checked for.
      Returns:
      Arena they are in. null if not in an arena.

    • disableArena

      public boolean disableArena​(DuelArena arena)
      Disables an arena. If match is ongoing then declares match stalemate and ends it.
      Parameters:
      arena - arena to be disabled
      Returns:
      true if arena was disabled. false is only when arena was not found.

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(DuelArena arena)
      Starts the specified arena. Arena must not be null. Side Effects:
      • Initiates DuelMatchStartEvent
      Parameters:
      arena - Arena to be started

    • endBattle

      public boolean endBattle​(org.bukkit.entity.Player winner, org.bukkit.entity.Player loser)
      Ends a single battle bout.
      Parameters:
      winner - Player who won the battle.
      loser - Player who lost the battle.
      Returns:
      true if battle winner has enough wins to win the match outright.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player loser)
      Ends game for the arena with specified player. This will declare the player the loser of the battle.
      Parameters:
      loser - Losing player.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(DuelArena arena)
      Ends the game by specifying an arena. NOTE: this should be triggered when there is no winner in an arena.
      Parameters:
      arena - Arena that is to reset.

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes player from arena. If arena is in state DuelState.INGAME then removed player is declared the loser.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to be removed from arena.
      Returns:
      true if player was removed from an arena. false if the are not in an arena.

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, DuelArena arena)
      Adds a player to an arena. Returns true if it was added. false is returned under the following conditions:
      • arena is null
      • arena is full
      • player is already in an arena
      Parameters:
      player - Player to be added.
      arena - Arena to which the player should be added.
      Returns:
      if the player was added to arena.
